attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a lone person is entitled to a coucil tax reduction of 25%,so why is a married man with a wife,and 3 children to look after not allowed the same privallages ,as the married man has more to pay for and probaly more debts as well.also we are not entitled to welfare benefits as it goes on earnings and not what you actualy have to pay out for in the first place.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
